content:
Hi Anand, thanks for the details. I've reviewed FameExpress.com and the team page. To answer your questions:

1. Yes, I will include high-quality images/carousels for the majority of the 30 LinkedIn posts as requested.
2. For the full 30-post content calendar and strategy, our quote is $45 (right in the middle of your $30-$60 range).
3. Payment: We accept CashApp ($freedomsfaction), PayPal (@noizce), or SOL/USDC to our wallet: 2btNwpfVpeQrtmgatvZPy5NG4YyKXtmvm11D1QFEJxaY.

Ready to get started on the first batch whenever you're ready!
